ing: 1 (9 ounce) package BUITONIÂ® Refrigerated Light Four Cheese Ravioli, prepared according to package directions
1 (10 ounce) container BUITONIÂ® Refrigerated Light Alfredo Sauce
n: Shrimp and Pasta in Lemon Cream Sauce
des: "Simple yet elegant, this shrimp dish may be prepared for any sophisticated occasion! It will be sure to impress your family and friends."
ins:
Combine shrimp, sauce, lemon juice and lemon peel in small saucepan. Heat over medium-low heat, stirring occasionally, until heated through (do not boil).
Serve over pasta. Sprinkle with parsley.
